column4: is there a command or app i can use to delete files with duplicate names so i can ditch my mp3's after i convert them using audacious?
since audacious doesnt seem to have a delete source file option
either that or anyone have a better converter then audacity?
I am working on a gui version of that but not without some crazy bash scripting... you could use rhythmbox, it can sort the music and show you duplicates like htat
